socviz 0.7.9000
  • Reference

socviz

This is an R package of datasets and functions to support a data visualization course taught with the book Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction (Princeton University Press, 2019).

Installation

socviz is not currently available from CRAN, but you can install it from github by launching R or R Studio and then:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kjhealy/socviz")

Load the library with

library(socviz)

The included datasets and functions are documented at http://kjhealy.github.io/socviz.
